title: Who Wins?
question_text: Five interns work for a large popcorn company. They are in a competition to see who can come up with the best idea to help with popcorn sales. They are required to use some sort of statistical test. Their five ideas are listed below. Four are in the running because they seemed to make sense, but one did not make sense. Which one mentions a test which does not coordinate with the information to be collected?
